    • findWinner

      public Integer[] findWinner() throws Exception
      Finds the winner of the game. The player who has built the most towers on islands wins the game. In case of a tie, the player who controls the most professors wins the game.
      Returns:
      the list of winners
      Throws:
      Exception - if something bad happens

    • communicateWinner

      public void communicateWinner(Integer[] teamIds)
      Communicates the winner of the game. This also notifies that the match ended.
      Parameters:
      teamIds - the ids of the winning teams
      Throws:
      Exception - if something bad happens

    • act

      public void act() throws Exception
      Checks if one of the game-ending conditions is satisfied. Ends the game if a condition is satisfied. If nobody wins, it puts all the assistant cards of the players down, ready to start the new round.
      Specified by:
      act in class Action
      Throws:
      Exception - if something bad happens
